Texts.Chs: <questGiver>是个好朋友。
Texts.Eng: <questGiver> is a good friend.

Texts.Chs: <questGiver>是一个正直的人。
Texts.Eng: <questGiver> is an honourable person.

Texts.Chs: <questGiver>失去了他们的荣誉。 好吧，拿着这个东西！
Texts.Eng: <questGiver> lost their honour. Fine then, take the <item>!

Texts.Chs: 好吧，好吧，我付钱...
Texts.Eng: Alright, Alright, I'll pay...

Texts.Chs: 你能把这个礼物放在我家吗? 我肯定它看起来会很棒的！
Texts.Eng: Could you place this gift in my home? I'm certain it would look great!

Texts.Chs: 你能送我到<questGiver>的家吗？
Texts.Eng: Could you please take me back home to <questGiver>?

Texts.Chs: 你能帮我谢谢<questGiver>吗？这个礼物太棒了！
Texts.Eng: Could you thank <questGiver> for me? This gift is wonderful!

Texts.Chs: 这个礼物是<questGiver>送的吗？ 或者这更像是一种贿赂？
Texts.Eng: Did <questGiver> send this gift? Or is it more of a bribe?

Texts.Chs: 有我的快递吗？
Texts.Eng: Do you have a delivery for me?

Texts.Chs: 你真的以为你可以用那个来吓唬我吗？滚开！
Texts.Eng: Do you really think you can scare me with that? Begone!

Texts.Chs: 好吧，好吧，冷静点，把<item>收起来。
Texts.Eng: Fine, fine. Just calm down and put that <item> away.

Texts.Chs: 你好。<questGiver>请我帮你对抗敌人。
Texts.Eng: Greetings. <questGiver> has asked me to help you fight the <enemy>.

Texts.Chs: 这是<questGiver>要求的<item>。
Texts.Eng: Here is the <item> that <questGiver> asked for.

Texts.Chs: 这是你要我做的<item>。
Texts.Eng: Here is the <item> you asked me to make.

Texts.Chs: 这是你要的<item>。我希望这正是<questGiver>所需要的。
Texts.Eng: Here is the <item> you requested. I hope it's what <questGiver> needed.

Texts.Chs: 给你！请帮我把这个拿给<questGiver>。
Texts.Eng: Here you go! Please, take this to <questGiver> for me.

Texts.Chs: 这是你的东西，好好享用吧！
Texts.Eng: Here's your goods. Do enjoy them!

Texts.Chs: 我经许可借用了<item>——我发誓！
Texts.Eng: I borrowed that <item> with permission - I swear it!

Texts.Chs: 我知道我什么时候会被打败，请放下武器！
Texts.Eng: I know when I am defeated. Please lower your weapon!

Texts.Chs: 我知道当我被打败的时候... 那么拿走我的<item>，但是离我远点！
Texts.Eng: I know when I'm defeated... Take my <item> then, but leave me alone!

Texts.Chs: 我早些时候做了这个<item>，请收下吧！
Texts.Eng: I made this <item> earlier. Please, take it!

Texts.Chs: 我看到你有我们需要的一切！ 等一下，我需要一些时间来制作...
Texts.Eng: I see you have everything we need! Hold a moment, I just need some time to craft...

Texts.Chs: 我以我的名誉起誓，<item>是合法取得的！
Texts.Eng: I swear on my honour, that <item> was acquired legally!

Texts.Chs: 我想知道<questGiver>想从我这里得到什么...
Texts.Eng: I would like to know what <questGiver> wants from me though...

Texts.Chs: 我宁死也不投降，你这个白痴！！
Texts.Eng: I'd rather die than surrender, you idiot!!

Texts.Chs: 我需要一些时间来恢复...你能带我去找<questGiver>吗？
Texts.Eng: I'll need some time to recover from this... Could you take me to <questGiver>?

Texts.Chs: 我会付罚款的，抱歉给您带来不便。
Texts.Eng: I'll pay the fine. Sorry for this inconvenience.

Texts.Chs: 我吃完了！把这个拿给 <questGiver>，好吗？
Texts.Eng: I'm all done! Take this to <questGiver>, would you?

Texts.Chs: 我肯定这个礼物放在我家里一定很好看。你能帮我放一下吗？
Texts.Eng: I'm certain this gift would look great in my home. Could you place it for me?

Texts.Chs: 我想我迷路了...你能把我带回到<questGiver>那里吗？
Texts.Eng: I'm think I'm lost... Could you take me back to <questGiver>?

Texts.Chs: 我迷路了...你能把我带回到<questGiver>那里吗？
Texts.Eng: I've lost my way... Could you please take me back to <questGiver>?

Texts.Chs: 如果<questGiver>需要我的<item>，他们当然可以借用。
Texts.Eng: If <questGiver> has need of my <item>, they can certainly borrow it.

Texts.Chs: 真的吗？ <questGiver>命令你用那个东西来吓我？不错的尝试。
Texts.Eng: Really? <questGiver> ordered you to scare me with that thing? Nice try.

Texts.Chs: 那么， <questGiver>现在开始行贿了吗？很好，那么，把我的谢意带给他们。
Texts.Eng: So <questGiver> is resorting to bribes now? Very well, then, bring them my thanks.

Texts.Chs: 当然，我会把我的<item>借给 <questGiver>。
Texts.Eng: Sure, I will lend <questGiver> my <item>.

Texts.Chs: 太棒了！你能把这个礼物放在我家吗？ 我肯定它看起来会很棒！
Texts.Eng: Sweet! Could you place this gift in my home? I'm certain it would look great!

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你给我带来这些货物。这是<questGiver>需要的<receivedItems>。
Texts.Eng: Thank you for bringing me these goods. Here's the <receivedItems> <questGiver> needed.

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你提供这个，这是<questGiver>需要的。
Texts.Eng: Thank you for delivering this. Here's what <questGiver> needed.

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你把我从困境中解救出来！
Texts.Eng: Thank you for getting me out of that mess!

Texts.Chs: 这个礼物非常好！请代我谢谢<questGiver>！
Texts.Eng: This gift is very nice! Please thank <questGiver> for me!

Texts.Chs: 这个礼物真不错，你能帮我放在我家吗？
Texts.Eng: This is a really nice gift. Can you place it in my home for me?

Texts.Chs: 你能帮我把这个回复带回给<questGiver>吗？
Texts.Eng: Would you take this reply back to <questGiver> for me?

Texts.Chs: 你才是王八蛋！我投降！
Texts.Eng: You are the sronger one! I surrender!

Texts.Chs: 你真的上当了？傻瓜！
Texts.Eng: You seriously fell for that? Fool!

Texts.Chs: 你是日海狄斯派来的！谢谢你救了我！
Texts.Eng: You were sent by Rhadeis! Thank you for rescuing me!

Texts.Chs: 你被骗了！
Texts.Eng: You've been tricked!

Texts.Chs: 你拿到材料了吗？ 等一下，我马上就去工作...
Texts.Eng: You've secured the materials? Hold a moment, I'll get to work immediately...
